mapper.select: select * from script_paper order by script_id
mapper.insert: insert into script_paper values( (select concat('script', (nvl(max(substr(script_id, 7)), 0)+1)) from script_paper), #{scene_id}, #{video_name}, #{video_date}, #{video_time}, #{video_end_time}, #{action_image}, #{action_content}, #{position_image}, #{conti} )
mapper.update: update script_paper set scene_id = #{scene_id}, video_name = #{video_name}, video_date = #{video_date}, video_time = #{video_time}, video_end_time = #{video_end_time}, action_image = #{action_image}, action_content = #{action_content}, position_image = #{position_image}, conti = #{conti} where script_id = #{script_id}
mapper.select: select * from time_table order by table_id
mapper.insert: insert into time_table values( (select concat('time', (nvl(max(substr(table_id, 4)), 0)+1)) from time_table), #{film_time}, #{time_num}, #{ok_ng}, #{slate_time}, #{script_id} )
mapper.update: update time_table set film_time = #{film_time}, time_num = #{time_num}, ok_ng = #{ok_ng}, slate_time = #{slate_time}, script_id = #{script_id} where table_id = #{table_id}
